template.name: Kobil Demo Transaction Approval
template.desc: Simple Kobil Demo with Exposition interleaved in the process. Two parties. Second party selected from drop-down.

forms.name: Select Reviewer and Submit or Cancel

flow.name: User Approval with fact
flow.BPMNXML:
<definitions targetNamespace="http://www.activiti.org/test" expressionLanguage="http://www.w3.org/1999/XPath" typeLanguage="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:omgdi="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:omgdc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:activiti="http://activiti.org/bpmn" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL">
    <message name="injectListJSON" id="injectListJSON"/>
    <process isExecutable="true" name="User Approval with fact" id="User_Approval_with_fact">
        <startEvent name="User Approval with fact" id="start"/>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="serviceTask17" sourceRef="start" id="flow31"/>
        <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="Get Message" id="serviceTask17">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
                    <activiti:string>poi_GetMessage_fact</activiti:string>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
                    <activiti:expression/>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="serviceTask18" sourceRef="serviceTask17" id="flow32"/>
        <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="selectitem" id="serviceTask18">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
                    <activiti:string>poi_selectitem_fact</activiti:string>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
                    <activiti:expression>${LIST_RECORDSMap}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="userTask19" sourceRef="serviceTask18" id="flow33"/>
        <userTask activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_select_form" name="select" id="userTask19"/>
        <boundaryEvent attachedToRef="userTask19" cancelActivity="false" name="Message" id="boundarymessage34">
            <messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/>
        </boundaryEvent>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="userTask20" sourceRef="userTask19" id="flow35"/>
        <userTask activiti:assignee="${reviewer}" activiti:formKey="poi_Message_form" name="Message" id="userTask20"/>
        <boundaryEvent attachedToRef="userTask20" cancelActivity="false" name="Message" id="boundarymessage36">
            <messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/>
        </boundaryEvent>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="snapshot21" sourceRef="userTask20" id="flow37"/>
        <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.SnapShot" name="List Objects" id="snapshot21">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="recordType">
                    <activiti:expression>"snapshot21"</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="serviceTask22" sourceRef="snapshot21" id="flow38"/>
        <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="getitem" id="serviceTask22">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
                    <activiti:string>poi_getitem_fact</activiti:string>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
                    <activiti:expression>${READMap}</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="serviceTask23" sourceRef="serviceTask22" id="flow39"/>
        <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.facts" name="Get Approval" id="serviceTask23">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="PluginKey">
                    <activiti:string>poi_GetApproval_fact</activiti:string>
                </activiti:field>
                <activiti:field name="parameterMap">
                    <activiti:expression/>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="userTask24" sourceRef="serviceTask23" id="flow40"/>
        <userTask activiti:assignee="${reviewer}" activiti:formKey="poi_Approve_form" name="Approve" id="userTask24"/>
        <boundaryEvent attachedToRef="userTask24" cancelActivity="false" name="Message" id="boundarymessage41">
            <messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/>
        </boundaryEvent>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="snapshot25" sourceRef="userTask24" id="flow42"/>
        <serviceTask activiti:class="plugins.SnapShot" name="List Objects" id="snapshot25">
            <extensionElements>
                <activiti:field name="recordType">
                    <activiti:expression>"snapshot25"</activiti:expression>
                </activiti:field>
            </extensionElements>
        </serviceTask>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="userTask26" sourceRef="snapshot25" id="flow43"/>
        <userTask activiti:assignee="${wf_currentAssignee}" activiti:formKey="poi_Review_form" name="Review" id="userTask26"/>
        <boundaryEvent attachedToRef="userTask26" cancelActivity="false" name="Message" id="boundarymessage44">
            <messageEventDefinition messageRef="injectListJSON"/>
        </boundaryEvent>
        <sequenceFlow targetRef="end" sourceRef="userTask26" id="flow45"/>
        <endEvent name="end" id="end"/>
    </process>
</definitions>
